topic: NK nuclear test readiness and indicators
summary: Tunnel No. 3 at Punggye-ri ready since 2022, but Nov 2025 satellite imagery shows no imminent test preparations
content: Key findings: (1) South Korea's Defense Intelligence Agency confirmed Tunnel No. 3 is physically ready for nuclear testing. (2) November 2025 satellite analysis shows no vehicles, human activity, instruments, power lines, or cables at test site. (3) US and South Korea have assessed since 2020 that all required preparations for 7th test from Tunnel No. 3 are complete. (4) Last nuclear test was September 2017 - over 8 years ago. (5) 6 tests conducted since 2006 over ~228 months = 2.63% base rate per month. (6) North Korea focused on missile testing and production expansion, not nuclear testing. (7) Workers' Party Congress expected Feb 2026 - Kim to announce new 5-year defense plan. (8) Trump-Kim diplomacy stalled; NK rejected US talks. (9) NK building ties with Russia/China.
